note.p: Daughter of Anthony and Harriot Kynnersley; baptised in Shrewsbury, Shropshire. Married Robert Panting in Leighton, Shropshire, in 1828; he changed his name to Gardner in 1844. Of Sansaw Hall, Clive, Shropshire.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office ), 1861 (RG9/1887/31/11)
England, select deaths and burials, 1538–1991 (Ancestry.com, accessed 4 December 2018)
Post Office directory of Gloucestershire, with Bath, Bristol, Herefordshire, and Shropshire 1863, 1870

Settlements and Wills 1834–1865 and affairs of T.C. Eyton (Shropshire Archives 665/493: https://discovery.nationalarchives.gov.uk/details/r/b485b5e1-2ddb-4e36-ab34-5a76c4b90f2e, accessed 26 September 2022)
